pkgmetadata.longdescription: Truncated Positive Normal Model and Extensions // Provide data generation and estimation tools for the truncated positive normal model discussed in Gomez, Olmos, Varela and Bolfarine (2018) doi:10.1007/s11766-018-3354-x, the slash truncated positive normal distribution discussed in Gomez, Gallardo and Santoro (2021) doi:10.3390/sym13112164, the bimodal truncated positive normal distribution discussed in Gomez et al. (2022) doi:10.3390/sym14040665 and the flexible truncated positive normal model.
